about_the_game:
The Sauce is Boss with this bundle. The Saucy Bundle has loads of every boost and tons of spoons to make your kitchen shine!

This Bundle contains:

2600 Spoons to help you upgrade your kitchen equipment;

8 +3 Customers boosts, so you have people to serve when it counts;

8 +30 Seconds boosts, so you can add time to the clock when you need it;

4 Price Doubler boosts that helps you earn more coins;

4 Waiter boosts that helps serve your dishes automatically to keep your hands free to cook;

4 Insta-Cook boosts to make your meals in a flash;

4 Burn-Proofer boosts that keeps your food looking fresh if you leave it cooking for too long;

8 Second Chance boosts to give you a do-over if you make a mistake;

8 Dazzler boosts that can stop everything when the going gets rough.

The Saucy Bundle is the perfect way to quickly spiff up your dishes and lower your cook times!
